en.bdb: She threw down by catching them from their hair and raising a tumult among their forces.

verse.gurmukhi: bfy bfy cux sUrmy gih kotI dey clwie kY ]
verse.unicode: ਬਡੇ ਬਡੇ ਚੁਣ ਸੂਰਮੇ ਗਹਿ ਕੋਟੀ ਦਏ ਚਲਾਇ ਕੈ ॥

en.bdb: She picked up mighty fighters by catching them with the corner of her bow and throwing them

ss.gurmukhi: v`fy v`fy sUrimAW nUM cux ky Aqy kroVw nUM pkV ky dUr sut id`qw।
